lights-in-the-trees.heading: Lights in the trees
lights-in-the-trees.text: As night falls, you spot some distant lights in the gathering gloom. Should you follow and investigate, or leave well alone?

prompts.label: I must see what they are...
No good comes from being too curious...

wisps.heading: They might be alive...
wisps.text: You get close to some of the lights, but they always seem to be ahead of you, leading you further into the gloom. Only then do you realise just how deep the forest is here.

forest-orchard.heading: Fruit orchard
forest-orchard.text: Apples, pears, cherries and plums: someone has taken the time to plant and tend to a number of fruit trees here.

forest-boar.heading: Boar sightings
forest-boar.text: You've spotted enough broken branches, flattened grass and droppings to know that there are boar in these woods.

forest-deer.heading: A herd of deer
forest-deer.text: You've spotted some tell tale tracks of deer amongst the trees, giving you a valuable source of food.

wild-tribe.heading: Wild tribe
wild-tribe.text: You've come across a small village of wild tribespeople. They don't speak your language, but by their gestures it seems that your presence is... unwelcome.

wild-tribe-peace.heading: Back away slowly.
wild-tribe-peace.text: You take the hint, and leave the villagers to it. You know they'll cause trouble in the surrounding area.

wild-tribe-attack.heading: To battle!
wild-tribe-attack.text: The tribe is no match for your organised force as you sack the village. A few get away into the trees.

prompts.label: I hope they don't find me later...

wild-tribe-attack (TODO when we do delay.heading: To battle!
wild-tribe-attack (TODO when we do delay.text: The tribe is no match for your organised force. You hack your way through them, leaving a sacked village. A few get away into the trees.

prompts.label: I hope they don't find me later...

clearing.heading: Clearing
clearing.text: A rare clearing in the deep woods gives you a chance to set up camp and take stock.

safe-harbour.heading: Natural Harbour
safe-harbour.text: You discover a fantastic natural rocky outcrop right next to deep water: a perfect place to launch larger boats.

driftwood.heading: Floating driftwood
driftwood.text: As you walk the narrow beach between the trees and the shore, you step over a number of heavy fallen branches.

fallback-forest.heading: Deserted forest
fallback-forest.text: You have found a stretch of empty woodland. A good source of fuel in future.

fallback-grassland.heading: Empty grasslands
fallback-grassland.text: You have discovered rolling grasslands: perfect for building, farming or grazing.

fallback-coast.heading: Towering cliffs
fallback-coast.text: The land ends abruptly here: best not get too close.

rocks.heading: Dangerous rocks
rocks.text: Watch out - those could easily punch a hole in the bottom of a ship.
